task.summary: Fixed unexpected resuming for playing on AudioFocusGain
Add info messages support Ann info messages for posting infopoints
Add info messages for pinboard operations
Add post_url to plugins, replace VK sdk liblary with maven, some engine fixes
Replace facebook library with maven artefact Add post support for FacebookPlugin

MESSAGE.value: Fixed unexpected resuming for playing on AudioFocusGain
Add info messages support Ann info messages for posting infopoints
Add info messages for pinboard operations
Add post url to plugins, replace VK sdk liblary with maven, some engine fixes
Add post_url to plugins, replace VK sdk liblary with maven, some engine fixes
Replace facebook library with maven artefact Add post support for FacebookPlugin

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Replace facebook library with maven artefact Add post support for FacebookPlugin
